document_data.name: Wagonrace
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wagonrace''' was a hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved road in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This road ran from northeast to southwest, running northeast off of [[Buckle Street]] and terminating on [[Wall Street]].
